title: Krak Minute – Science and Tech, Shanghai
content:
Consider the following skateboarding’s roll of honor:

Barney Page – Crook & bs smith – Sour Solution
Wes Kremer – Wallie bs fifty – DC ‘Skateboarding is Forever’
Gabriel Summers – Noseslide 270 out – 5 years at the bottom
Vince Del Valle – Lipslide – Adidas ‘Diagonal’
Alex Lawson – Fs crook – Element ‘New World’
Matt Berger – Flip fs noseslide – Etnies ‘Album’
Jorge Simoes – Tailslide flip out – Jart ‘PROject’
Dennis Durrant – Nollie crook – Element ‘New World’
Nestor Judkins – Switch bs fifty – Adidas ‘Diagonal’
Jerry Hsu – Switch 5-0 revers – Emerica ‘Stay Gold’
Carlos Ribeiro – Switch bs tail – ‘All For You’
Flo Mirtain – Fakie 5-0 – Habitat welcome part
author: simon
